labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Client is not able to connect. After a few retries it fails with the error message "No route to host".
data.expected_result: Voice chat connects and works normally.
data.short_description: Voice chat displaying no route on dual-stack IPv4/IPv6 network
data.steps_to_repro: - Set up a working dual-stack IPv4/IPv6 network- Then deploy a NAT64 gateway and assign a DNS64 server as DNS-server for the clients. - Try joining a voice room in Discord.
